Wowhead
Wowhead

Messenger to Stormwind

Take General Marcus Jonathan's letter of response to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire.
The General's Response

Description

While I wait for a response from the King I want you to carry this letter to Magistrate Solomon.

Dismissed, <class>!

Progress

Did the General send news? Are reinforcements on the way?

Completion

Thank you for your time, <class>. For your service to Lakeshire and Stormwind I reward you with these coins.

Now if you'll excuse me, I find this correspondence somewhat of a mystery. Something is amiss in our Kingdom. I fear this is the beginning of conflict, not the end.

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 245 Experience
  • 25 Reputation with Stormwind
